thread.title: Nina Dobrev throws the 'La La Land'-themed party of our dreams
thread.title_full: Nina Dobrev throws the 'La La Land'-themed party of our dreams

title: Nina Dobrev throws the 'La La Land'-themed party of our dreams
text:
Nina Dobrev throws the 'La La Land'-themed party of our dreams Sara Moniuszko 3:17 p.m. ET Jan. 23, 2017 20 Shares 
We know what film Nina Dobrev thinks is Oscar-worthy. 
The actress celebrated her 28th birthday this weekend with a glamorous La La Land -themed party that she shared on Instagram. A photo posted by Nina Dobrev (@ninadobrev) on Jan 22, 2017 at 2:37pm PST 
Other stars attended the party, which took place at an old-timey game and cocktail lounge in Los Angeles, including Breaking Bad ’s Aaron Paul and Dancing With The Stars siblings Julianne and Derek Hough. A photo posted by @ronniebacardi on Jan 22, 2017 at 3:02pm PST 
The celebration was a joint birthday for Dobrev and polo player Ronnie Bacardi, who were collectively turning 60. A photo posted by Nina Dobrev (@ninadobrev) on Jan 22, 2017 at 3:16pm PST 
Dressed for the part, Dobrev was channeling her Emma Stone spirit throughout the night and posted a side-by-side of her striking a pose from the A Lovely Night scene. A photo posted by Nina Dobrev (@ninadobrev) on Jan 22, 2017 at 4:02pm PST 
But the fun didn’t stop there -- a hilarious photoshopped cake made the celebration even sweeter. A photo posted by Nina Dobrev (@ninadobrev) on Jan 22, 2017 at 2:34pm PST 
Hope you loved your dreamy #LaLaLandThemedBirthday, Nina. We sure did. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2kkQ8zA Most Popular
